amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for the suspension and removal of VA employees for performance or misconduct that is a threat to public health and safety in place of the proposed removal process.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 232 (Roll no. 166).

action.text: Amendment (A007) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Takano.
